description.narrative: The Accountable Entity's, the Millennium Challenge Account (MCA) Mongolia II, administrative costs, which include staff salaries, financial audits, and fiscal and procurement agent fees.

condition.narrative: Delivery of a Fiscal Agent Certificate in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
Delivery of a Procurement Agent Certificate, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
Delivery of a completed Conditions Precedent Report, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
Delivery of a completed Disbursement Request form, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
Delivery of a completed Disbursement Request package, together with the applicable Periodic Reports, for the applicable Disbursement Period, all in accordance with the Reporting Guidelines.
Delivery of a completed Procurement Performance Report, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
Delivery of a completed Quarterly Financial Report/Detailed Financial Plan, in form and substance satisfactory to MCC, covering the related Disbursement Period.
If Compact CDF Disbursement are to be deposited in a bank account, evidence of executed Bank Agreement and established Permitted Account.
True and complete copy of a Fiscal Agent Agreement, duly executed and in full force and effect.
True and complete copy of a Procurement Agent Agreement, duly executed and in full force and effect.
